message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of the significant benefits it will bring to your business.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you starting the conversation.  While I see the value in this product, $1,100,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to offer $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value we both see in this deal.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value this product brings is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.  This feels like a fair compromise that recognizes the significant benefits you'll gain.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still a bit hesitant at $1,050,000.  I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it reflects the true value of this product.
